name: Tourist Visa
description: Perfect for leisure travel, sightseeing, and visiting friends or family. Includes comprehensive documentation support and expedited processing options.

name: Business Visa
description: Designed for business meetings, conferences, and professional engagements. Fast-track processing available for urgent business needs.

name: Student Visa
description: For academic pursuits including university studies, research programs, and educational exchanges. Includes guidance on documentation requirements.

name: Work Visa
description: Employment-based visa for professionals seeking work opportunities abroad. Comprehensive support for work permit applications.

name: Transit Visa
description: Short-term visa for travelers passing through the country to reach their final destination. Quick processing for urgent travel needs.

name: Family Reunion Visa
description: For joining family members residing abroad. Specialized assistance for family-based immigration and reunion processes.

name: Medical Visa
description: For medical treatment and healthcare services abroad. Expedited processing available for urgent medical situations.

name: Investment Visa
description: For entrepreneurs and investors looking to establish business ventures. Comprehensive support for investment documentation.

name: Diplomatic Visa
description: For government officials, diplomats, and international organization representatives. Specialized processing for official government business.

name: Journalist Visa
description: For media professionals, reporters, and journalists covering events or conducting interviews. Fast-track processing available.

name: Religious Visa
description: For religious workers, missionaries, and spiritual leaders attending religious events or conducting religious activities.

name: Cultural Exchange Visa
description: For artists, performers, and cultural ambassadors participating in cultural programs and exchange initiatives.

name: Sports Visa
description: For athletes, coaches, and sports officials participating in competitions, training, or sporting events abroad.

name: Research Visa
description: For researchers, scientists, and academics conducting research projects or collaborating with international institutions.

name: Retirement Visa
description: For retirees seeking to relocate and enjoy their retirement years abroad. Long-term visa options with renewal support.
